import React, { useState } from 'react' const Input = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState({ name : '', email : '', cell : '', uname : '', gender : '' }) console.log(input); let {name, email, cell, uname } = input //validation using form-submit const handleFormSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if( name === '' || email === '' || cell === '' || uname === ''){ console.log('tor maire baap'); } else{ console.log('alles gut'); } } return ( <>

setInput( {...input,email:e.target.value} )}/>
setInput( {...input,cell:e.target.value} )}/>
setInput( {...input,uname:e.target.value} )}/>
setInput( {gender:e.target.value} )}/> setInput( {gender:e.target.value} )} />
) } export default Input
